data.title: Maisha Film Lab
data.text:
Daniel Nyalusi

Posted at 10:33h in by Maisha Film Lab

Introduction:

Over 7 years’ experience in film-making including Documentary, Fiction, Drama feature film and Short films as Screenplay writer, Director and Production Manager, plus over 6 years’ experience in organizing International Film Festival.

Knowledge Background:

Attended Digital Film Academy (New York-USA) – Master Class in Filmmaking (24 Weeks Course).

Attended Acting Master Class by Giancarlo Esposito and Directing Master Class by Jean Pierre Bekolo at Kenya International Film Festival (KIFF) in October 2009

Attended Screenwriting workshop and Script Development by Maisha Film Lab (Uganda) and

Attended Film Master Class at Berlinale Talent Campus (Germany) and Durban International Film Festival (South Africa) in August 2008.

Attended Film Critics Workshop by SIGNIS & FIPRESCI Juries, Photograph by Angele Etondi Essamba, Master Class for Independent Filmmakers by Melvin Van Pebbles, Narration of Modern World Cinema by Krzysztof Zanussi, Acting Master Class by Malick Bowens at Zanzibar International Film Festival (ZIFF) in July 2006.

Attended Screenwriting Course and Pitching for film ideas by Tanzania Screenwriters Forum and Savannah Films (Tanzania/UK) in June -July 2006.

Attended One Minutes Film Production (Camera work, Editing and producing) by One Minute Foundation (The Netherlands) and Zanzibar International Film Festival (ZIFF) in July 2005.

Portfolio

INDUSTRIAL PORTFOLIO:

Attended round table at Fajr International Film Festival and Film Market (Iran) in February 2012.

Attended round table and Film Market at Fajr International Film Festival and Film Market (Iran) in February 2011.

Attended different round tables at Iran International Short Film Festival (Iran) in November 2010

Attended Southern Film Festival Round Table at Aljazeera International Documentary Film Festival Doha, Qatar in April 2010.

Presented a paper on East African Film Industry experience at 6th Amakula Kampala International Film Festival (Uganda) in November 2009.

Attended a round table on how to make Southern Film Festivals successful at Granada International Film Festival (Cines Del Sur in Spain) in June 2009.

Presented paper on The Challenges of East African Film Industry at Amani Great Lakes Film Festival Rwanda) in December 2008 – January 2009.

Presented a paper on The Growth of Tanzania Film Industry and the Effect of Pirates at Amakula Kampala International Film Festival (Uganda) in November 2008.
